column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were left to stand at the bar for approximately 2 hours
column2: each having 3 drinks. Our first round of cocktails were a Southside and a Vesper. It was delivered with
column3: "I'm sorry your cocktails are very labor intensive." I'm not quite sure why she felt the need to preface that
column4: but alas I understand that and that's why we are here - to have high end cocktails created by hospitality professionals.
